participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and driven, loves storytelling and has a nurturing side as a cat lover.
participant_1.background: My height is average for my age. I practice vegetarianism. I need to move because my convertible is not practical for driving to school. I am a cat lover who enjoys making organic cat food for my furry friend. I’m writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Hands-on and practical, enjoys working with his hands and solving problems.
participant_2.background: I enjoy tinkering with my car, working on it in the garage and fixing it up. I go to college part time. I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing. It takes me an hour to drive to work in the morning. I enjoy crosswords, crocheting, and football.

content.text: Hello! Not much, just working on my car. What about you?
I'm writing my first novel. I'm really excited about it!
It's a fantasy novel about a young woman who goes on an adventure to save the world.
That sounds really cool! I love fantasy novels. Do you have a title yet?
Not yet, but I'm working on it. I'm hoping to have it finished by the end of the year.
That's a lot of work! Good luck with it!
Thanks! I'm going to need it!
What kind of car do you have?
It's a convertible. It's a lot of fun to drive, but it's not very practical for driving to school.
I can imagine! I have a truck, so I don't have to worry about that.
Yeah, I'm thinking about trading it in for a more practical car.
